query.description: Data field(s) to sort by. Separate multiple fields with commas. Denote descending sort with a minus sign.
Filter by status code: A, C, H, X.
Filter by title. Wildcards are supported.

request.description: Creates a new ticket. Users can only create tickets for themselves. Managers can create tickets for any user.
